content.raw:
I’m not a particular fan of changing the default text editor to Sublime \(I’m not really a fan of having the default editor be Notepad\+\+ either\).

Perhaps we could have the installer detect some of the common text editors and present options for the user to select \(and/or type in a custom path at installation time\). We could do something similar for HDFView too \(so that people with old versions of HDFView installed don’t have to revert the labconfig of new labscript suite installs to the old path\)
